definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to keep watch/to do sentry duty/to be on patrol

sentences.english: Bone whistles, used as a type of flute, have been found dating back to 5,000 BC.
sentences.chinese: 用作笛子的骨哨早已出现在公元前5，000年。

sentences.english: The referee whistled and the game began.
sentences.chinese: 裁判员吹了哨，比赛开始。

sentences.english: A small fipple flute with with finger and two thumb .
sentences.chinese: 带有个手指和两个拇指的哨笛。

sentences.english: The SENTRY GUNS are silent, and the GATES are open to the forest.
sentences.chinese: 哨戒炮沉默了，地狱之门向森林敞开。

sentences.english: Safe and reliable pressure reducer assembly and low-pressure whistle.
sentences.chinese: 安全可靠的减压器总成及低压报警哨。

sentences.english: I am simply saying that the non-calls easily outnumber the superstar calls.
sentences.chinese: 我只是在说，没有吹罚的次数远超过明星哨。

sentences.english: Our lookout spied a man hiding in some bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我们的嘹望哨发现一个人藏在树丛中。

sentences.english: Our look - out spied a man hiding in some bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我们的了望哨发现树丛中藏着人。

sentences.english: A small fipple flute with with four finger two thumb .
sentences.chinese: 四个手指和两个拇指哨笛。

sentences.english: A small fipple flute with with four finger and two thumb .
sentences.chinese: 带有四个手指和两个拇指的哨。

sentences.english: A loud whistle disturbed the quietness of the church.
sentences.chinese: 一声响哨打破了教堂的宁静。

sentences.english: 'I need you to be on the lookout, because you're always hyper-vigilant. '
sentences.chinese: 我需要你来看哨，因为你总是非常警惕周围。

sentences.english: A small fipple flute with with finger and two thumb .
sentences.chinese: 带有个手指和两个拇指哨笛。

sentences.english: People want bells and whistles, companies need functional tools.
sentences.chinese: 人们需要铃和哨，企业也需要具备相应功能的工具。

definition: Yingpan, common place name ("army camp")/place near Jintian village 金田村[Jin1 tian2 cun1] in Guangxi where the Taiping Tianguo rebels took their oaths in 1851/place in Xinfeng county 新豐縣|新丰县[Xin1 feng1 Xian4] traditional camping place of brigands/Yingpan township, place name/Yingpan in Shangluo prefecture, Shaanxi/Yingpan township in Yunnan/(many others)
to open fire/to shoot a gun
